titleStmt.title: Anglorum speculum, or, The worthies of England in church and state alphabetically digested into the several shires and counties therein contained : wherein are illustrated the lives and characters of the most eminent persons since the conquest to this present age : also an account of the commodities and trade of each respective county and the most flourishing cities and towns therein.
titleStmt.author: Sandys, George, 1578-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright ... Thomas Passinger ... and William Thackary ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Sandys. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Pages beginning-209 are tightly bound in filmed copy. Beginning-p. 213 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
